title: Darker
description: A cold and arrogant criminal. A Billionaire’s Daughter. An arranged marriage.MariaBeing the daughter of a billionaire you would think my life had always been easy.But no, not for one second has my life ever been easy.And now I’m being forced into a marriage with my father’s right-hand man, and if I refuse him I stand to lose my inheritance.And while I find him extremely handsome, it’s the darkness that I sense in him that both frightens and calls to me.DamienMy boss wants to give me his daughter.Sounds simple, doesn’t it?If only that were true.His rivals have threatened her life and now he wants me to take her as my wife.To love, honor, and protect her for the rest of my days.I want her.But how can I protect her from myself?How can I honor her when the darkness inside me demands that I defile and break her?Each book in the Boyne Valley Club Series is based on a different couple but in the same world.
author: Vi Carter
